title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks end lower ahead of busy week of earnings; Dow drops 40 points, or 0.1% - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks end lower ahead of busy week of earnings; Dow drops 40 points, or 0.1%  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stocks fell on Monday as investors returned from a holiday weekend and geared up for another busy week of corporate earnings results.
